title: When Making Dua, Can we Use Allah's Translated Names? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: fatima says please explain when making dua can't we use a smell or personal meaning translated in our language jazakomallahu khayran when you call Allah Azza WA JAL you call him by his beautiful names not by the translation you don't say Oh God give me this almost forgiving forgive my sins these are not Allah's names these are our translation you say Ya Allah give me this or that Yahoo Yahoo far yeah rougher Italy forgive me my sins so you use a lot beautiful names in Arabic and not in other languages but you can ask the door in other languages
